From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

French

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Inherited from Old French tressaillir, from tres- (“across”) + saillir (“jump”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /tʁe.sa.jiʁ/
  • Audio:(file)
  • Audio (France (Lyon)):(file)
  • Audio (France (Somain)):(file)

Verb

[edit]

tressaillir

  1. to thrill, shiver, quiver
  2. to vibrate
  3. to twitch, start, shudder, jump

Conjugation

[edit]

This verb is part of a small group of verbs in -ir that conjugate in the indicative imperfect and present, the subjunctive present, and the present participle, as if they ended in -er. They are sometimes written with an 'e' in the future and imperfect, like cueillir and other verbs in -llir.

Conjugation of tressaillir (see also Appendix:French verbs)

1 The French gerund is usable only with the preposition en.
2 In less formal writing or speech, these tenses may be found to have been replaced in the following way:
past historic → present perfect
past anterior → pluperfect
imperfect subjunctive → present subjunctive
pluperfect subjunctive → past subjunctive

(Christopher Kendris [1995], Master the Basics: French, pp. 77, 78, 79, 81).

Further reading

[edit]
  • “tressaillir”, in Trésor de la langue française informatisé [Digitized Treasury of the French Language], 2012.

Old French

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

tres- +‎ saillir.

Verb

[edit]

tressaillir

  1. to jump over or jump across
  2. to jump for joy

Conjugation

[edit]

This verb conjugates as a third-group verb. This verb has irregularities in its conjugation. Old French conjugation varies significantly by date and by region. The following conjugation should be treated as a guide.

    Conjugation of tressaillir (see also Appendix:Old French verbs)
simple compound
infinitive tressaillir avoir tressali, tressailli
gerund en tressalant, tressaillant gerund of avoir + past participle
present participle tressalant, tressaillant
past participle tressali, tressailli
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu il nos vos il
simple
tenses 		present tressail tressaus tressaut tressalons, tressaillons tressalez, tressailliez tressalent, tressaillent
imperfect tressaloie, tressaleie, tressailloie, tressailleie tressaloies, tressaleies, tressailloies, tressailleies tressaloit, tressaleit, tressailloit, tressailleit tressaliiens, tressaliens, tressailliiens, tressailliens tressaliiez, tressaliez, tressailliiez, tressailliez tressaloient, tressaleient, tressailloient, tressailleient
preterite tressali, tressailli tressalis, tressaillis tressali, tressailli tressalimes, tressaillimes tressalistes, tressaillistes tressalirent, tressaillirent
future tressaudrai tressaudras tressaudra tressaudrons tressaudroiz, tressaudreiz, tressaudrez tressaudront
conditional tressaudroie, tressaudreie tressaudroies, tressaudreies tressaudroit, tressaudreit tressaudriiens, tressaudriens tressaudriiez, tressaudriez tressaudroient, tressaudreient

Descendants

[edit]
  • Middle French: tressaillir
    • French: tressaillir
